Set the interaction mode to active.

Brian set the interaction mode to active.
The Setting "InteractionModeSetting" has been changed to Active. Quickly confirm.
The interaction mode has been successfully changed to active. How can I assist you further?
Let's test the interaction modes. Just respond briefly.
Understood. I'm here and ready to test the interaction modes.
Switch it back to passive.
The Setting "InteractionModeSetting" has been changed to Passive. Quickly confirm.
Brian, can you explain to me what the interaction modes mean?

11/27/2023 8:21:47AM
The System time update is for your information. You remain silent "..." unless this update is significant.
Ryan.
Brian Respond.

The interaction mode settings control how often I respond to new messages. In active mode, I have the opportunity to respond to every new message. In passive mode, I only respond when I'm summoned or have an alert.
